Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n6o4x9W5gZ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/9wgrMfXdW4k" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><strong>Estron</strong> tried a hand at a first-time cinematic and it’s a rather good watch! Alongside a thumping, yet orchestral soundtrack, <strong>"Cinematic"</strong> captures all the majesty, exhilaration, fear, failure and jubilation that comes with the <em>KSP</em> experience.</p>
Awesome cinematic! I'm glad to see this was featured!
That was amazing! What music did you use for that?
Altough my cinematic is not as good, I would appreciate it if you guys checked it out

Although you've clearly thought out the cinematic well, I would've liked to have seen the use of kerbcam for every shot and also some more effort in post production, for example colour grading and perhaps a letterbox.

EDIT: Just read that this was your first attempt at a cinematic, in that case: it's pretty good all round

But consider what I've mentioned for the future.

Edited June 5, 2014 by HatBat
